sense.def:
Kadar neki kraj ali dogodek
livens up
ali kadar nekdo
livens it up
, postane zanimivejši in vznemirljivejši.

seg.quote: There are lots of new shops and things. The place is really livening up.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
liven up
ali kadar nekaj
livens them up
pomeni, da ljudje postanejo bolj veseli in polni moči.

seg.quote: At least the incident livened her up.
